item.content:encoded:
It is time for week 3 of the NFL season, and this BetMGM promo code below has one of the best offers on the market. Take advantage of this new offer.

First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in Bonus Bets if you don’t win

Claim Offer

The current BetMGM promo code WHINERS is being offered to all new customers. With this offer new users can get up to $1,500 in Bonus Bets

If you are looking to take advantage of the biggest first time deposit offer in the industry, look at the information on this page. If you already understand how the BetMGM Promo Code work, get started by opening a new BetMGM account here.

BetMGM Promo Code WHINERS: Earn Bonus Bets up to $1,500

The current BetMGM promo code will provide new customers with first-bet insurance up to $1,500.

Let’s make this simple. After signing up, if your first bet loses, your sports book account will be refunded with bonus bets equal to your original wager up to $1,500.

You can claim this BetMGM promo code offer by creating an account at BetMGM via our link and make a deposit and first bet of at least $10. By using the link we have provided, no promo code will be required.

How to Claim the BetMGM Promo Code WHINERS

To claim the BetMGM promo code bonus, use our step-by-step guide below:

  1. Register for a new BetMGM account with our link and no promo code will be needed
  2. Make a deposit of $10+
  3. Place a first bet of up to $1,500

When the qualifying bet you make settles, you will receive bonus bets equal to the amount you bet if it loses. Use the Winners and Whiners link to create your BetMGM account today to get started. HERE

What makes BetMGM special?

One of the best features at BetMGM Sportsbook is their existing customer promotions. These include free-to-play games that will allow you to earn $20 in bonus bets on a weekly basis. Another example would be parlay insurance for Sunday Night Football games.

Of course, there is also the BetMGM promo code deal that you can claim as a new customer, which will give you first-bet insurance up to $1,500 when you open a new account using our link.

How do I make a NFL wager with BetMGM?

Betting on the NFL at BetMGM is very easy, and below, we have explained the steps you will need to take:

  1. From the BetMGM homepage, click the “NFL” tab
  2. Find the odds for the NFL game you want to bet on
  3. Click the odds of the bet you want to place
  4. Go to your bet slip and enter how much money you want to bet
  5. Click “Place Bet”

BetMGM Promo Code: What are the Terms & Conditions?

The following compilation outlines the terms and conditions associated with the BetMGM promo code bonus:

    1. Eligibility is limited to new users.
    2. Customers must meet a minimum age requirement of 21 years.
    3. All customers must physically reside within a participating BetMGM state.
    4. The initial deposit and first bet should be a minimum of $10.
    5. Qualifying bets exceeding $50 will be granted as five separate bonus bets.
    6. Bets below $50 will be awarded as a single bonus bet.

Does everyone get Bonus Bets with BetMGM?

The BetMGM bonus bets are not issued if your first bet wins. However, if your first wager losses, here is how the BetMGM promo works:

  1. Add the bet you are making to your bet slip
  2. While reviewing your bet slip, click “Apply Bonus Bet”
  3. Pick the bonus bet you want to apply
  4. Confirm your bet

You can make more by Referring a Friend with your BetMGM Code

BetMGM’s “refer a friend” bonus is another option where you can increase your bankroll without placing a bet. You can refer up to 20 friends and each time when one of your friends signs up with BetMGM, both of you will receive $50 in bonus bets.

For you to claim your bonus, your friend will need to make their first deposit and place the $50 of their bonus.

When looking to sign up for a new sportsbook, check out winnersandwhiners.com/betting, where you can see all the current promotions and offers for new users at the top sportsbooks. Winners and Whiners offers all the latest sports gambling news, and predictions for all games from the major sports. Being a profitable sports gambler does not happen by chance. It takes research, insight, and diligence to find the best odds and resources to become successful.  

BetMGM Promo Code WHINERS: Get Bonus Bets Today

Are you ready for Week 3 in the NFL? Get some extra ammunition for your bankroll and claim our BetMGM promo code offer before it is too late. You can activate this offer by using the link provided to register for a new BetMGM account without the need of a promo code. Make a deposit of at least $10 and a first bet up to $1,500 on any game this week to receive first-bet insurance up to $1,500. If the first bet you make ends up losing, bonus bets equal to the amount you bet will be issued to your account.

 

Gambling problem? Call 1-800-GAMBLER (CO, DC, IL, IN, LA, MD, MS, NJ, OH, PA, TN, VA, WV, WY) Call 877-8-HOPENY or text HOPENY (467369) (NY). 21+ to wager. Please Gamble Responsibly. item.content:encoded:
Winners and Whiners has the best Kentucky sports betting promos for launch day on September 28. With the launch day approaching, sports bettors anticipation is building.

Customers in the Bluegrass State can now start claiming Kentucky sportsbook promos, allowing them to receive bonus funds that will be available for use when sports betting promos goes live on September 28.

Here’s a closer look at some available Kentucky betting promos, and others we expect to see in the near future.

What are Kentucky Sports Betting Promos?

The state of Kentucky has the potential to become one of the larger sports betting markets in the United States. Kentucky betting apps have to compete heavily for users, and the best way to do this is by offering enticing bonuses and other promotions that keep the bettors coming back.

Kentucky sports betting promos range greatly, depending on the sports betting platform. This guide breaks down some of the more important options available as well as how to use KY sportsbook promo codes.

How to Claim Kentucky Sports Betting Promos

The Process for claiming Kentucky betting promos before sports betting goes live is quite simple. Select the offer you wish to claim, complete the registration process, and wait until September 28 to access your bonus bets. That’s it! No deposit is required for prelaunch offers.

  •  Claim DraftKings KY Promo – $200 in bonus bets (no deposit)
  •  Claim FanDuel KY Promo – $100 in bonus bets (no-deposit)
  •  Claim BetMGM KY Promo – $100 in bonus bets (no-deposit)

When it comes to claiming Kentucky sports betting promos after launch, the process is usually straightforward. First, you’ll need to sign up for an account with a reputable online sportsbook that operates in the state.

Once you’ve created your account, navigate to the promotions section of the website or mobile app. In some instances, it may be necessary to include one of the available Kentucky sports betting promo codes when registering with the sportsbook.

Existing sportsbook promos will mirror what users can expect to see in the Bluegrass State.

Redeem Your Kentucky Sports Betting Promos

Most Kentucky betting sites have dedicated sections on their websites or apps where they list their current and best Kentucky sportsbook promos. This makes it easy for you to find and explore the different offers available. Some may require you to enter a promo code during registration or when making a deposit, so keep an eye out for any specific instructions.

BetMGM Kentucky Bonus Offer (Projected) – $1,500 First Bet Offer

One of the top Kentucky betting promos available is from BetMGM. The $1,500 First Bet Offer provides an exciting opportunity for bettors in Kentucky to embark on their betting journey with added enthusiasm and potential winnings. Use BetMGM bonus code WAWMETAGET

To take advantage of this offer, new users need to sign up and make their first deposit on the BetMGM platform. Once the deposit is made, they can place their first bet, and if it loses, BetMGM will refund the amount up to $1,500 in bonus.

 Claim BetMGM KY Prelaunch Offer

Even if the initial bet doesn’t go as planned, bettors get a second chance with bonus funds to explore a vast array of sports markets and betting options.

The $1,500 First Bet Offer not only enhances the betting experience but also provides a safety net for new users. BetMGM is an attractive choice for sports enthusiasts looking to wager on their favorite teams and games.

FanDuel Kentucky Welcome Promo Offer (Projected) – Bet $5, Get $200 In Bonus Bets

Kentucky sports fans and prospective bettors are thrilled about the September 28th launch of FanDuel Sportsbook in the state. FanDuel is one of the most well-respected sportsbooks in the country, and its prelaunch promotion has generated a lot of excitement in the Bluegrass state.

The limited-time FanDuel Kentucky bonus code offers new users a $100 bonus bet. You can claim  FanDuel promo code now and get $100 in bonus bets when sports betting goes live on September 28.

 Claim FanDuel KY Prelaunch Offer

To access the welcome bonus following the platform’s release, fresh users only need to make a qualifying bet of a minimum of $5 on a suitable sporting event. After the bet is resolved, they will be granted $200 in bonus wagers, allowing them to explore numerous sports markets and potentially increase their earnings.
These bonus wagers can be employed on any sport or market of your preference within a seven-day period from when they are received. Regardless of whether you’re a devotee of football, basketball, baseball, or any other sport, there are ample chances to make the most of these bonus wagers.

The “Bet $5, Receive $200 in Bonus Bets” offer not only grants users the chance to explore the platform and its wide range of betting choices but also enhances their betting experience with FanDuel, making it more valuable and thrilling.

DraftKings Kentucky Welcome Promo (Projected)- Bet $5, Get $200

DraftKings is a renowned online sports betting and daily fantasy sports platform that attracts users with its enticing Kentucky sports betting promo of up to $200 in bonus bets when you sign up and place your first $5 bet on the app.

The limited-time prelaunch special for new customers, which includes $200 in bonus bets with no deposit needed. Get a DraftKings promo code and register before September 28 to take advantage.

 Claim DraftKings Prelaunch Offer

After launch, upon signing up and making their first deposit, users can receive an instant bonus after placing their first real money wager of $5 or more. This not only increases the potential winnings for bettors but also allows them to explore various betting options by using bonus bets.

As with any promotional offer, certain terms and conditions apply, and users are advised to review the requirements and guidelines before claiming the bonus.

Overall, the DraftKings bonus bets offer adds an extra incentive for sports enthusiasts. You can join the platform and engage in thrilling betting activities while enjoying the potential benefits of this generous promotion.

Jumpstart your bankroll with the Sports Betting Offers in Kentucky

The new Kentucky sports betting promos can greatly enhance your betting experience and increase your winnings.

  • Sign-up bonuses: The popular sportsbooks are offering sign-up bonuses to new customers. These bonuses can be in the form of free bets, deposit matches, or other rewards.
  • Risk-free bets: Risk-free bets are a type of promotion that allows you to place a bet without any risk of losing money. If your bet loses, the sportsbook will refund your stake.
  • Profit Boosts: Offer higher than usual odds on selected events. This means that you can win more money if your bet is successful.
  • Cashback rewards: Cashback rewards are a type of promotion that gives you a percentage of your losses back in the form of bonus money.
  • VIP programs: Many sportsbooks offer VIP programs for their most loyal customers. These programs offer exclusive benefits, such as enhanced odds, higher limits, and personal customer service.

When choosing a Kentucky sportsbook, comparing the different promotions offered is important. Some factors to consider include the size of the bonus, the terms and conditions, and the sportsbook’s reputation. It is also important to remember to gamble responsibly and only bet what you can afford to lose.

Sports To Bet On With Kentucky Betting Promos

When it comes to Kentucky online gambling & betting there are plenty of exciting options to choose from. You can make your wagers even more enticing with the added bonus of promotions and offers. Whether you’re a fan of the NFL, college basketball, or horse racing there’s something for you

College Football Betting in Kentucky

Football season is an exciting time for SEC and ACC football fans.  Coming soon, Kentucky sportsbooks will offer a variety of betting options for both college football and basketball enthusiasts. With top-tier teams like the Kentucky Wildcats, Louisville Cardinals, and Western Kentucky Hilltoppers, there are plenty of opportunities to make winning picks.

Stay Current with Kentucky Sportsbook Promos

It’s worth keeping an eye on the promotions page of our preferred Kentucky sportsbooks. This way you will not miss out on any exciting offers. Remember to always read the terms and conditions. It is important to check the requirements for the Kentucky betting promo codes. To ensure you meet all requirements and maximize your rewards.

FanDuel: 21+ and present in KY. Bonus issued in non-withdrawable bonus bets that expires 7 days after FanDuel accepts its first real money sports wager in KY (“Go Live Date”). Unique user identity verification required. Offer ends on the Go Live Date. Restrictions apply. See terms at sportsbook.fanduel.com. Help is available 24 hours a day, every day. Call 1-800-GAMBLER (1-800-426-2537) for assistance.

BetMGM: Must be 21+ to wager. KY only. New Customer Offer (If applicable). All promotions are subject to qualification and eligibility requirements. Rewards issued as non-withdrawable bonus bets. Bonus bets expire in 7 days from issuance. Gambling Problem? Call 1-800-GAMBLER.

DraftKings: Gambling problem? Call 1-800-GAMBLER. 18+. Physically present in KY. Eligibility restrictions apply. Subject to regulatory and licensing requirements. New customers who successfully sign-up will receive $200 in Bonus Bets on launch day. Bonus Bets expire 7 days (168 hours) after being awarded. Bonus bets must be wagered 1x and stake is not included in winnings. See terms at http://draftkings.com/sportsbook/ky

item.content:encoded:
Tonight we have two Monday Night Football games. You do not want to miss out on the FanDuel Promo Code offer HERE. This FanDuel Promo Code will allow you to Get $200 in Bonus Bets for simply betting $5 on your initial wager.

Winners and Whiners has teamed to get you a great FanDuel Bonus Code here. FanDuel is providing NFL fans with an opportunity to find out why they are one of the best sportsbooks in the United States! Currently, new FanDuel users are invited to join the action by grabbing up to $200 in bonus bets on Winners and Whiners.

Bet $5 Get $200 + $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket

Claim Offer

The FanDuel Promo Code is applied instantly after you make your first bet. The offer is one of the easiest to obtain the sports betting industry. With two Monday Night Football games tonight, it is a great time to use the FanDuel Promo Code.

Here is a Monday Football Free Pick, you may want to use your FanDuel Promo Code Bonus Bets on today

  • New Orleans Saints at Carolina Panthers
  • Date: Monday Sept. 18, 2023
  • Time: 7:15 pm  EST
  • Free Pick from Paul Biagioli

The Panthers hired Thomas Brown to be their offensive coordinator, and the pressure is on to find ways to score. Brown will manufacture ways for Bryce Young to be successful in their home opener, whether it be designed runs or quick reads that fit his skill set. The Saints offense is due to explode, Carr threw for over 300 yards in the opener and spread the ball to all of his offensive weapons. When the Saints line up with Olave, Shaheed, and Thomas all on the outside, they are impossible to cover. This is a relatively low total to cover, the Saints will do their part, and the Panthers have their back against the wall offensively. Even if the Panthers lose, they need to prove they can score some touchdowns with the way their team is constructed.

Prediction: Over 39.5

 

The FanDuel Promo code is already included in the link below. Sign up today, bet $5, and also enjoy up to $200 in bonus bets  HERE.

  • Cleveland Browns at Pittsburgh Steelers
  • Date: Monday Sept. 18, 2023
  • Time: 8:15 pm  EST
  • Free Pick from Adam Rauzino

The Cleveland Browns were able to make the Bengals look like a last-place squad last week. They demolished Burrow and the Bengals 24-3 in a game that was never in doubt. The Steelers were overmatched by the 49ers on offense and defense in their opener.

Furthermore, offensively the Browns are better than the Steelers. Deshaun Watson is a proven QB who had some incredible seasons with the Texans and Nick Chubb is possibly the best RB in the NFL. I mention Chubb because the Steelers allowed 188 rushing yards against the 49ers. I expect Chubb to have a big game after recording 106 yards last week. He also registered 190 rushing yards in the two bouts against the Steelers last season. Pickett struggled against the Browns last year, connecting on 45% of his passes for only 195 yards.

Prediction: Cleveland Browns -2.5

Grab the limited-time FanDuel Promo Code and get $100 off the NFL Sunday Ticket with your Bonus Bets HERE

The FanDuel Promo Code offer is truly one of the best available among all sportsbooks. What makes FanDuel’s offer great is it is easy to understand, and it is a benefit to everyone who receives it. With FanDuel, new users will receive $200 in Bonus Bets + $100 off on NFL Sunday Ticket, regardless of if their first qualifying bet wins or loses on the first bet.

I personally love how FanDuel overall has been to easy to work with. Their customer service is excellent, and they also offer a great variety of payout options. Depositing and making withdrawals are also easy.

Here are a few more reasons why you should grab your FanDuel Promo Code offer today:

  • FanDuel allows you to withdraw any money deposited and that is won right away.  
  • The bonus is easy to understand and it is a benefit that everyone receives it, win or lose on the first bet.
  • The variety of sports that you can wager is impressive. The list includes MLB, NFL, WNBA, NBA, tennis, golf, soccer in leagues all over the word, golf, racing, boxing, MMA and even includes cricket and snooker 
  • The NFL Ticket Promotion expires on Monday Sept. 18

item.content:encoded:
Get ready for Monday Night Football with the Best Betting Picks Today for the Saints vs Panthers with Winners and Whiners!  We also have all the Best NFL Sportsbook Betting Bonus Codes for today. Did you know that you can bet $50 on any NFL game today and get $250 in bonus bets by registering with Caesars Sportsbook promo code WAWMETAGET? Well, you can right here!

Before betting on the Saints vs Panthers, make sure to not leave any bonus offers on the table.

By signing up through the links on this page, you’ll be eligible to activate Caesars Sportsbook exciting Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets promo code offer for the NFL season and in time to coincide with the start of the NFL season for the best betting picks.

Saints vs Panthers – Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets with Promo Code: WAWMETAGET CLAIM HERE

Tonight’s Marquee Match:

  • New Orleans Saints vs Carolina Panthers
  • Date: Monday, Sept. 18, 2023
  • Time: 7:15 PM ET

WinnersandWhiners.com Expert Handicapper Mark Ruelle Writes:

Panthers’ QB Young will likely have another challenging week facing an even tougher defense than he did in week one against the Falcons. The Saints’ secondary is physical and will play a lot of man-to-man on the outside. The Panthers’ lack of explosive plays in week one has to be a concern as Young only threw for just over 145 yards and didn’t complete anything longer than 14 yards. The Titans presented a more experienced, physical challenge for the Saints in week one. Carr should find smoother sailing this week against the Panthers’ defense.

Prediction: New Orleans Saints -3

BetMGM Promo Code WHINERS: First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in Bonus Bets if you don’t win

Claim Offer

Disclaimer

 

StatSalt.com writer Paul Biagioli writes this about the Saints vs Panthers:

Both teams feature new quarterbacks, but the veteran will adapt to his new team faster than the rookie will. Bryce Young had a tough preseason opener with only 21 yards and no scoring drives, and he did not play well in the season opener with only 146 yards and more interceptions than touchdowns. On the other side of the field, Carr threw for over 300 yards and made clutch plays down the stretch to win a close game in his first game with New Orleans. The Saints’ defense was excellent on all levels and did not allow a single touchdown against the Titans. Bryce Young will have a difficult time leading drives against a team that had 3 sacks and 3 interceptions last week. New Orleans is still without Kamara, but Williams is a capable fill-in until he returns. The Saints’ young receivers, Olave and Shaheed, far outperformed any of the wideouts on Carolina. The better quarterback, offensive weapons, and defense, also line on the side of the Saints..

Prediction: New Orleans Saints -3

item.content:encoded:
Week 2 of the NFL season is here. Make sure you decrease your risk by taking advantage of the BetMGM Bonus Code WHINERS now!  Winners and Whiners has partnered with BetMGM to allow new bettors to obtain up to $1,500 in bonus bets this Sunday.

With the BetMGM Bonus Code WHINERS, even if you lose, you win! You’ll get a refund in bonus bets equal to whatever you lost, up to $1,500. This is the largest first time deposit bonus in the industry. Do not miss out!

Remember that you must use the bonus code WHINERS to claim this offer.

First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in Bonus Bets if you don’t win

Claim Offer

The slate on Saturday is College Football focused but if you are interested in betting on other sports, BetMGM has options and offers of your choosing. Follow this link to start and use the BetMGM bonus code of WHINERS when signing up.

How do I get the BetMGM Bonus Code for Saturday and Sunday?

Check out our players today from the HOTTEST CAPPERS in the sports betting industry. Winners and Whiners also has free picks on all the College Football, NFL, and MLB slate.

How does the BetMGM Bonus Code work?

A lot of bettors hear about bonuses, but how does it work? How can this bonus help you as a player?

  • If you win your first wager at BetMGM, you get to keep the bet and the profit. It will then become withdrawable cash.
  • If you lose your first bet, then your account will be credited with bonus bets which are equal to the amount you wagered. However, if you want to see the full $1,500 back in bonus bets, you are required to deposit and bet the max of $1,500. If you deposit and wager just $100 and it fails to win, you’ve accumulated $100 in bonus bets. If you deposit and bet $500 and it loses, you would receive $500 back in bonus bets. The same applies to any amount.

What does the BetMGM Bonus Code mean?

The BetMGM Bonus Code is entitled “WHINERS”, which gets you a $1,500 first bet offer as a new customer.

You can make more by Referring a Friend with your BetMGM Code

BetMGM’s “refer a friend” bonus is another option where you can increase your bankroll without placing a bet. You can refer up to 20 friends and each time when one of your friends signs up with BetMGM, both of you will receive $50 in bonus bets.

For you to claim your bonus, your friend will need to make their first deposit and place the $50 of their bonus.

Grab up to $1,500 in bonus bets in return if their first wager does not win. The best news is that even if you lose, you win! You’ll get a refund in bonus bets equal to whatever you lost, up to $1,500. Remember that you must use the bonus code WINNERS to claim this offer.

item.content:encoded:

Promo Code: WAWMETAGET

One of the best things about the Caesars Promo Code is that you will receive this offer regardless of if your first bet wins or loses. There are 16 NFL games to bet on this week, along with a huge slate of College Football and MLB games! Make sure to take advantage of the Caesars Promo Code this weekend.

Here is a NFL game you may want to use your Caesars Promo Code: WINNERSFULL Bonus Bets on today

  • Miami Dolphins vs New England Patriots
  • Date: Sunday, Sept. 17, 2023
  • Time: 7:20 pm  EST
  • Free Pick from The Tower

The home team tends to win these games (five of the last six), which is why taking the Patriots is a great play for Sunday night. Miami’s run defense is going to be porous if last week is any indication, and New England will definitely be trying to avoid another 55+ passing play day for the offense. Finding early success on the ground will avoid another hole, allowing the Patriots to run their offense freely. Even if they do trail, the Dolphins also struggle to stop passes, dating back to last season, and the Patriots pass protection was sturdy last week. Mac Jones will have time to operate and find receivers.

Miami’s offense may seem lethal, but the Patriots have had answers for them. Last year, the Dolphins scored 20 in the first meeting and 21 in the second against New England. If anyone had a game plan to neutralize Miami’s speed, it would be Patriots head coach Bill Belichick. As is, the Patriots have a strong defense. That defensive group was top-10 in yards per pass attempts last year and opened this season with another strong showing. That’ll be the key to stopping Miami since they don’t run the ball often. At worst, the Patriots will only lose this game by a few points. A win is very likely too. Take the spread because it’s safer, but don’t be afraid of the Patriots moneyline.

Prediction: New England Patriots +3

Here is a College Football Free Pick, you may want to use your FanDuel Promo Code Bonus Bets on today

  • Fresno State at Arizona State
  • Date: Saturday Sept. 16, 2023
  • Time: 10:30 pm  EST
  • Free Pick from The Admiral

Arizona State’s offense hasn’t impressed at all through the first two weeks of the new season. The Sun Devils’ defensive line will put a lot of pressure on Mikey Keene, but their offense will struggle to make a difference down the stretch. Jaden Rashada lacks experience, and the Sun Devils’ ground game is far away from an elite level.

The Bulldogs, on the other side, look like a team that can move the ball more frequently than Arizona State. I’m backing Fresno State to come out on top and beat a 3-point line, but it won’t be an easy task by any means.

The Bulldogs are 5-1 ATS in their last six games overall and 7-2 ATS in their previous nine encounters with the Pac-12 Conference. They are undefeated in ten straight outings at any location. The Sun Devils are 1-6 ATS in their last seven games overall, 1-4 ATS in their last five home contests, and 0-5 ATS in their previous five encounters with the Mountain West Conference.

Prediction: Take the Fresno State Bulldogs -3.0 (-110)
